messages.subject: Cary Condell...You rang
messages.msgSnippet: Rich, I ve received the standard 200 + emails today. I did receive two with the subject Mail delivery failed . The content contained all nonsense symbols
messages.messageBody:
Rich,
I've received the standard 200 + emails today.
I did receive two with the subject "Mail delivery failed".
The content contained all nonsense symbols which sometimes
happens when my provider detects a possible virus infected mail.

I'll send this same mail to you privately.
Cary

Condell & Co., Ltd.
P.O. Box 590115
San Francisco, CA 94159

Tel. 415-751-3784

condell@...
http://www.ikkyudo.com

richard.turner wrote:

> Anyone know if Cary's email is on the fritz ?, I have tried twice to
> contact him and both itmes, the mail has bounced. Cary if you are seeing
> this, can you contact me please.
>
> Rich
>

Anyone know if Cary's email is on the fritz ?, I have tried twice to contact him and both itmes, the mail has bounced. Cary if you are seeing this, can you contact me please.

Rich
